name: Ghastly Gary
description:
On his way to work one day Gary gets hit by a car! Suddenly, he wakes up in a strange place with a cannon strapped to his hand...

* Controls *

Shoot: Left Mouse

Movement: W A S D

Jump: Space Bar | You can jump up to 5 times.

Have fun!

*This is for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022*

This is my first solo jam and this was an awesome experience. It was a great way to help me understand all the pieces that go into even a simple game. I started learning game dev with the GameDev.tv 2D course at the start of this month so the idea of joining a jam was daunting but I am glad I took the challenge and completed it! I look forward to relaxing and playing all of these great entries!

I tried to upload a webGL build but for some reason mouse clicks don't register in the world but the do on the UI. But the mouse clicks do register in the editor... If someone knows a fix to this please send me a message. I'd like to put a web build up asap but I can't find the solution.

* BUG FIXED*

If anyone else also had this issue my solution was to mix the old input system with the new one, then made added a check in update for when the left mouse button is pressed.

I wanted to create all the assets myself, but unfortunately I ran out of the time for the audio.
